metadata.title: CVE-2023-52448 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gfs2: Fix kernel NULL pointer dereference in gfs2_rgrp_dumpSyzkaller has reported a NULL pointer dereference when accessingrgd->rd_rgl in gfs2_rgrp_dump().  This can happen when creatingrgd->rd_gl fails in read_rindex_entry().  Add a NULL pointer check ingfs2_rgrp_dump() to prevent that.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
